summary: "The Hunting Party" is Linkin Park's sixth album, released in 2014. It's a return to their rock roots after experimenting with electronic sounds. The band wanted to bring back the energy of rock music. This album is different because it features collaborations with other artists for the first time. It was well-received, reaching number three on the US Billboard 200 and getting positive reviews for its heavy sound. Five singles were released, and the album went platinum in the US.
title: The Hunting Party (album)
